query.statement:
WITH TMP AS ( SELECT LE002.MANDT AS MANDT ,LE002.ZKNUM AS ZKNUM ,LE002.ZKNUM2 AS ZKNUM2 ,LE002.PSPID AS PSPID ,LE002.POST1 AS POST1 ,LE002.ZTEXT AS ZTEXT ,LE002.BEZEI AS BEZEI ,LE002.ERDAT AS ERDAT ,LE002.ERZET AS ERZET ,LE002.DPTEN AS DPTEN ,LE002.UPTEN AS UPTEN ,LE002.AEDAT AS AEDAT ,LE002.UZEIT AS UZEIT ,SUBSTR(CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON1 > 0 THEN ',1T-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON1 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON2 > 0 THEN ',2.5T-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON2 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON3 > 0 THEN ',3.5T-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON3 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON4 > 0 THEN ',5T-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON4 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON5 > 0 THEN ',8T-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON5 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON6 > 0 THEN ',11T-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON6 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON7 > 0 THEN ',18T-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON7 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON8 > 0 THEN ',25T-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON8 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON9 > 0 THEN ',Trailer-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON9 )) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON10 > 0 THEN ',택배-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON10)) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON11 > 0 THEN ',Trailer(20)-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON11)) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON12 > 0 THEN ',Trailer(40)-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON12)) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON13 > 0 THEN ',Trailer(20)round-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON13)) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON15 > 0 THEN ',셔틀-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON15)) ELSE '' END || CASE WHEN LE002.ZTON14 > 0 THEN ',Trailer(40)round-' || TRIM(CHAR(LE002.ZTON14)) ELSE '' END,2) AS ZTON ,LE002.ZLZONE AS ZLZONE ,VALUE(TZONT.VTEXT, '') AS ZLZONE_NM ,LE002.ZTYPE AS ZTYPE ,CASE LE002.ZTYPE WHEN '11' THEN '천안->현장' WHEN '12' THEN '업체->현장' WHEN '13' THEN '업체->천안' WHEN '14' THEN '현장->천안' WHEN '15' THEN '이천->천안' ELSE '' END AS ZTYPE_NM ,LE002.ZCHAN AS ZCHAN ,CASE LE002.ZCHAN WHEN '1' THEN '현장문제' WHEN '2' THEN '폭설,폭우' WHEN '3' THEN '운송사 차량수배 불가' WHEN '4' THEN '골조지연' WHEN '5' THEN '기타' ELSE '' END AS ZCHAN_NM ,VALUE(LE002.NAMET, '') AS NAMET ,VALUE(LE002.MOB_NUMBER,'') AS MOB_NUMBER ,VALUE(LE002.TRAID, '') AS TRAID ,LE002.POSID AS POSID ,MAST2.TEMNO AS ZZTEMNO
,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.PSPID,7,2) = 'NC' THEN MA01.NAMET ELSE MAST2.NAMET END AS ZZTEAMJ ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.PSPID,7,2) = 'NC' THEN SAPHEE.GET_TELE_FORMAT (VALUE(MA01.CELLP, '')) ELSE SAPHEE.GET_TELE_FORMAT(VALUE(PS011.CELLP, '')) END AS CELLP
,MAST2.TEMNO2 AS ZZTEMNO2 ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.PSPID,7,2) = 'NC' THEN MA01.NAMET2 ELSE MAST2.NAMET2 END AS ZZTEAMJ2 ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.PSPID,7,2) = 'NC' THEN SAPHEE.GET_TELE_FORMAT (VALUE(MA01.CELLP2, '')) ELSE SAPHEE.GET_TELE_FORMAT(VALUE(( SELECT CELLP FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 AS PS001 WHERE PS001.MANDT = MAST2.MANDT AND PS001.LIFNR = MAST2.LIFNR AND PS001.TEMNO = MAST2.TEMNO2 AND PS001.POSIT = 'X' FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), '')) END AS CELLP2
--SAPHEE.GET_TELE_FORMAT(VALUE(( -- SELECT -- CELLP -- FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 AS PS001 -- WHERE PS001.MANDT = MAST2.MANDT -- AND PS001.LIFNR = MAST2.LIFNR -- AND PS001.TEMNO = MAST2.TEMNO2 -- AND PS001.POSIT = 'X' -- FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY -- ), '')) AS CELLP2 ,SAPHEE.GET_LE_HOGI(LE002.MANDT,LE002.ZKNUM,LE002.ZKNUM2) AS HOGI ,MAST2.ZSPEC1 ,MAST2.ZSPEC2 ,LE002.ZTRANS AS ZTRANS ,LE002.TABNM AS TABNM ,SAPHEE.GET_LE_SPEC(LE002.MANDT,LE002.ZKNUM,LE002.ZKNUM2) AS SPEC ,VALUE(MA01.ZZACTSS, '') AS ZZACTSS ,GUBN AS GUBN , VALUE(L22.SMDATE1, '') AS SMDATE1 -- 배차 SMS전송일 , VALUE(L22.SMDATE2, '') AS SMDATE2 -- 차량 SMS 전송일 , MA01.ZQNTY AS ZQNTY , VALUE((SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(ZSTAT3) = 'X' THEN '3' WHEN MAX(ZSTAT2) = 'X' THEN '2' WHEN MAX(ZSTAT1) = 'X' THEN '1' ELSE '' END FROM SAPHEE.ZLET017 AS L7 WHERE L7.MANDT = LE002.MANDT AND L7.ZKNUM = LE002.ZKNUM AND L7.ZKNUM2 = LE002.ZKNUM2 AND L7.ZCANC='' GROUP BY ZKNUM,ZKNUM2),'') AS ZSTAT --배차자 추가 신종길kj 요청 2016.07.29 , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.ERNAM,1,1) = 'M' THEN 'ERP' ELSE U.USERNAME END AS ERNAM --윤용채kj 요청으로 영업딜러 추가 2016.11.01 yw ,SAPHEE.GET_TELE_FORMAT(VALUE(( SELECT KNA1.STRAS FROM SAPHEE.PRPS AS PRPS INNER JOIN SAPHEE.VBAP AS VBAP ON PRPS.MANDT=VBAP.MANDT AND PRPS.PSPNR=VBAP.PS_PSP_PNR INNER JOIN SAPHEE.VBPA AS VBPA ON VBAP.MANDT=VBPA.MANDT AND VBAP.VBELN=VBPA.VBELN AND VBPA.PARVW='Z2' INNER JOIN SAPHEE.KNA1 AS KNA1 ON VBPA.MANDT=KNA1.MANDT AND VBPA.KUNNR=KNA1.KUNNR WHERE PRPS.MANDT= MAST2.MANDT AND PRPS.POSID = LE002.POSID FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ), '')) AS CELLP3 ,LE002.TPLSTDT1 ,LE002.TPLSTDT2 ,LE002.TPLSTDT3 ,LE002.TPLSTDT4 ,LE002.TPLSTDT5 ,LE002.TPLSTDTQTY1 ,LE002.TPLSTDTQTY2 ,LE002.TPLSTDTQTY3 ,LE002.TPLSTDTQTY4 ,LE002.TPLSTDTQTY5 ,LE002.TPLSTDTZTON1 ,LE002.TPLSTDTZTON2 ,LE002.TPLSTDTZTON3 ,LE002.TPLSTDTZTON4 ,LE002.TPLSTDTZTON5 ,LE002.TPLSTDT6 ,LE002.TPLSTDTQTY6 ,LE002.TPLSTDTZTON6 ,LE002.TPLSTDT7 ,LE002.TPLSTDTQTY7 ,LE002.TPLSTDTZTON7 ,SAPHEE.GET_LE_SPEC2(LE002.MANDT,LE002.ZKNUM,LE002.ZKNUM2) AS SPEC2 ,LE002.CHNGCONFIRM ,LE002.LIFNRCO FROM (
SELECT T2.MANDT AS MANDT ,T2.ZKNUM AS ZKNUM ,T2.ZKNUM2 AS ZKNUM2 ,MAX(T3.PSPID ) AS PSPID ,MAX(T3.POST1 ) AS POST1 ,MAX(T2.ZTEXT ) AS ZTEXT ,MAX(T2.BEZEI ) AS BEZEI ,MAX(T2.ERDAT ) AS ERDAT ,MAX(T2.ERZET ) AS ERZET ,MAX(T2.DPTEN ) AS DPTEN ,MAX(T2.UPTEN ) AS UPTEN ,MAX(T2.ZTON1 ) AS ZTON1 ,MAX(T2.ZTON2 ) AS ZTON2 ,MAX(T2.ZTON3 ) AS ZTON3 ,MAX(T2.ZTON4 ) AS ZTON4 ,MAX(T2.ZTON5 ) AS ZTON5 ,MAX(T2.ZTON6 ) AS ZTON6 ,MAX(T2.ZTON7 ) AS ZTON7 ,MAX(T2.ZTON8 ) AS ZTON8 ,MAX(T2.ZTON9 ) AS ZTON9 ,MAX(T2.ZTON10) AS ZTON10 ,MAX(T2.ZTON11) AS ZTON11 ,MAX(T2.ZTON12) AS ZTON12 ,MAX(T2.ZTON13) AS ZTON13 ,MAX(T2.ZTON14) AS ZTON14 ,MAX(T2.ZTON15) AS ZTON15 ,MAX(T3.ZLZONE) AS ZLZONE ,MAX(T2.ZTYPE ) AS ZTYPE ,MAX(T2.ZCHAN ) AS ZCHAN ,MAX(T2.ZTRANS) AS ZTRANS ,'2' AS TABNM ,MIN(T4.POSID) AS POSID ,'2' AS GUBN ,MAX(T2.NAMET) AS NAMET ,MAX(T2.MOB_NUMBER) AS MOB_NUMBER ,MAX(T2.TRAID) AS TRAID ,MAX(T2.AEDAT) AS AEDAT ,MAX(T2.UZEIT) AS UZEIT ,MAX(T2.ERNAM) AS ERNAM ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDT1) AS TPLSTDT1 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDT2) AS TPLSTDT2 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDT3) AS TPLSTDT3 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDT4) AS TPLSTDT4 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDT5) AS TPLSTDT5 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTQTY1) AS TPLSTDTQTY1 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTQTY2) AS TPLSTDTQTY2 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTQTY3) AS TPLSTDTQTY3 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTQTY4) AS TPLSTDTQTY4 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTQTY5) AS TPLSTDTQTY5 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTZTON1) AS TPLSTDTZTON1 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTZTON2) AS TPLSTDTZTON2 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTZTON3) AS TPLSTDTZTON3 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTZTON4) AS TPLSTDTZTON4 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTZTON5) AS TPLSTDTZTON5 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDT6) AS TPLSTDT6 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTQTY6) AS TPLSTDTQTY6 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTZTON6) AS TPLSTDTZTON6 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDT7) AS TPLSTDT7 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTQTY7) AS TPLSTDTQTY7 ,MAX(T2.TPLSTDTZTON7) AS TPLSTDTZTON7 ,MAX(T2.CHNGCONFIRM) AS CHNGCONFIRM ,MAX(T2.LIFNR) AS LIFNRCO FROM SAPHEE.ZLET002 AS T2 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET003 AS T3 ON T2.MANDT = T3.MANDT AND T2.ZKNUM = T3.ZKNUM AND T2.ZKNUM2 = T3.ZKNUM2 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET004 AS T4 ON T3.MANDT = T4.MANDT AND T3.VBELN = T4.VBELN
AND T4.ZZTEMNO= '' -- 설치 협력사만 적용
WHERE T2.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND T2.ZKNUM LIKE '_%' AND T3.PSPID = #PJT# AND T2.ZCANC <> 'X'
GROUP BY T2.MANDT,T2.ZKNUM,T2.ZKNUM2
UNION
SELECT T6.MANDT AS MANDT ,T6.ZKNUM AS ZKNUM ,T6.ZKNUM2 AS ZKNUM2 ,MAX(T7.PSPID ) AS PSPID ,MAX(T7.POST1 ) AS POST1 ,MAX(T6.ZTEXT ) AS ZTEXT ,MAX(T6.BEZEI ) AS BEZEI ,MAX(T6.ERDAT ) AS ERDAT ,MAX(T6.ERZET ) AS ERZET ,MAX(T6.DPTEN ) AS DPTEN ,MAX(T6.UPTEN ) AS UPTEN ,MAX(T6.ZTON1 ) AS ZTON1 ,MAX(T6.ZTON2 ) AS ZTON2 ,MAX(T6.ZTON3 ) AS ZTON3 ,MAX(T6.ZTON4 ) AS ZTON4 ,MAX(T6.ZTON5 ) AS ZTON5 ,MAX(T6.ZTON6 ) AS ZTON6 ,MAX(T6.ZTON7 ) AS ZTON7 ,MAX(T6.ZTON8 ) AS ZTON8 ,MAX(T6.ZTON9 ) AS ZTON9 ,MAX(T6.ZTON10) AS ZTON10 ,MAX(T6.ZTON11) AS ZTON11 ,MAX(T6.ZTON12) AS ZTON12 ,MAX(T6.ZTON13) AS ZTON13 ,MAX(T6.ZTON14) AS ZTON14 ,MAX(T6.ZTON15) AS ZTON15 ,MAX(T7.ZLZONE) AS ZLZONE ,MAX(T6.ZTYPE ) AS ZTYPE ,'' AS ZCHAN ,'' AS ZTRANS -- 배차 ,'' AS TABNM -- 현장직투입 ,MIN(T7.POSID) AS POSID ,'6' AS GUBN ,MAX(T6.NAMET) AS NAMET ,MAX(T6.MOB_NUMBER) AS MOB_NUMBER ,MAX(T6.TRAID) AS TRAID ,MAX(T6.AEDAT) AS AEDAT ,MAX(T6.UZEIT) AS UZEIT ,MAX(T6.ERNAM) AS ERNAM ,'' AS TPLSTDT1 ,'' AS TPLSTDT2 ,'' AS TPLSTDT3 ,'' AS TPLSTDT4 ,'' AS TPLSTDT5 ,'' AS TPLSTDTQTY1 ,'' AS TPLSTDTQTY2 ,'' AS TPLSTDTQTY3 ,'' AS TPLSTDTQTY4 ,'' AS TPLSTDTQTY5 ,'' AS TPLSTDTZTON1 ,'' AS TPLSTDTZTON2 ,'' AS TPLSTDTZTON3 ,'' AS TPLSTDTZTON4 ,'' AS TPLSTDTZTON5 ,'' AS TPLSTDT6 ,'' AS TPLSTDTQTY6 ,'' AS TPLSTDTZTON6 ,'' AS TPLSTDT7 ,'' AS TPLSTDTQTY7 ,'' AS TPLSTDTZTON7 ,MAX(T6.CHNGCONFIRM) AS CHNGCONFIRM ,MAX(T6.LIFNR) AS LIFNRCO FROM SAPHEE.ZLET006 AS T6 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET007 AS T7 ON T6.MANDT = T7.MANDT AND T6.ZKNUM = T7.ZKNUM AND T6.ZKNUM2 = T7.ZKNUM2 WHERE T6.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND T6.ZKNUM LIKE '_%' AND T7.PSPID = #PJT# AND T6.ZCANC <> 'X'
GROUP BY T6.MANDT,T6.ZKNUM,T6.ZKNUM2
) AS LE002
-- LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET009 AS LE009 ON LE009.MANDT = LE002.MANDT -- AND LE009.ZKNUM = LE002.ZKNUM -- AND LE009.ZKNUM2 = LE002.ZKNUM2 -- AND LE009.PSPID = LE002.PSPID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.TZONT AS TZONT ON TZONT.MANDT = LE002.MANDT AND TZONT.SPRAS = '3' AND TZONT.LAND1 = 'KR' AND TZONT.ZONE1 = LE002.ZLZONE LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS MAST2 ON MAST2.MANDT = LE002.MANDT AND MAST2.POSID = COALESCE(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,1,2)='QM' THEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,3,6) WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,1,1)='Q' THEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,2,6) WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,1,1)='V' THEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,2,6) ELSE SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,1,6) END,'') AND MAST2.POSID_1= COALESCE(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,1,2)='QM' THEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,3,9) WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,1,1)='Q' THEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,2,9) WHEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,1,1)='V' THEN SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,2,9) ELSE SUBSTR(LE002.POSID,1,9) END,'') LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0011 AS PS011 ON PS011.MANDT = MAST2.MANDT AND PS011.TEMNO = MAST2.TEMNO AND PS011.RETIF = '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS MA01 ON MA01.MANDT= LE002.MANDT AND MA01.POSID = LE002.PSPID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET022 AS L22 ON L22.MANDT= LE002.MANDT AND L22.ZKNUM = LE002.ZKNUM AND L22.ZKNUM2 = LE002.ZKNUM2 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZUSERF AS U ON U.MANDT = LE002.MANDT AND U.USERNUMB = LE002.ERNAM
WHERE 1=1 --AND (LE002.ZTON1+LE002.ZTON2+LE002.ZTON3+LE002.ZTON4+LE002.ZTON5+LE002.ZTON6+LE002.ZTON7+LE002.ZTON8+LE002.ZTON9+LE002.ZTON10) > 0 )
SELECT '' AS FLAG , '0' AS CHECK , T1.MANDT , T1.ZKNUM , T1.ZKNUM2 , CASE WHEN T1.ZKNUM2 > '' THEN T2.PSPID ELSE T1.PSPID END AS PSPID2 , T1.PSPID , T1.POST1 , T1.ZTEXT , CASE WHEN T1.TPLSTDT1 = '' AND T1.TPLSTDT2 = '' AND T1.TPLSTDT3 = '' AND T1.TPLSTDT4 = '' AND T1.TPLSTDT5 = '' THEN T1.BEZEI ELSE LF1.NAME1 END BEZEI , T1.ERDAT , T1.ERZET , T1.DPTEN , T1.UPTEN , T1.AEDAT , T1.UZEIT , CASE WHEN T1.TPLSTDT1 = '' AND T1.TPLSTDT2 = '' AND T1.TPLSTDT3 = '' AND T1.TPLSTDT4 = '' AND T1.TPLSTDT5 = '' THEN T1.ZTON ELSE T1.TPLSTDTZTON1 END ZTON , T1.ZLZONE , T1.ZLZONE_NM , T1.ZTYPE , T1.ZTYPE_NM , T1.ZCHAN , T1.ZCHAN_NM , '' AS NAMET , '' AS MOB_NUMBER , '' AS TRAID , T1.POSID , T1.ZZTEMNO , T1.ZZTEAMJ , T1.CELLP , T1.ZZTEMNO2 , T1.ZZTEAMJ2 , T1.CELLP2 , T1.HOGI , T1.ZSPEC1 , T1.ZSPEC2 , T1.SPEC , T1.ZZACTSS , T1.GUBN , SAPHEE.GET_LE_MSG1(T1.PSPID,T1.POST1,T1.ZTEXT, T1.ZTON,T1.DPTEN,T1.UPTEN) AS MSG , SAPHEE.GET_LE_MSG2(T1.PSPID,T1.ZTON,T1.TRAID,T1.NAMET,SUBSTR(T1.MOB_NUMBER,1,13),T1.DPTEN,T1.UPTEN) AS MSG1 , T1.SMDATE1 , T1.SMDATE2 , T1.ZQNTY , T1.ERNAM , T1.CELLP3 , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(T1.PSPID,1,1) = 'Q' THEN ( SELECT VALUE(TELH,'') FROM SAPHEE.ZHRT001 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZQMT007 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSNO = B.CREID WHERE A.MANDT = T1.MANDT AND B.JQPRNO = T1.PSPID ) ELSE '' END AS QCELLP --,case when lt001.lifcd = 'A' then '로지' -- when lt001.lifcd = 'B' then '신원' -- else '' END as lifcd ,case when T1.LIFNRCO = '3148131696' then '로지' when T1.LIFNRCO = '1018194310' then '신원' when T1.LIFNRCO = '3038100062' then '중앙' else '' END as lifcd --,SAPHEE.GET_TELE_FORMAT (VALUE(mma01.zsite_tel, '')) as zsite_tel ,case when left(pm07.ztel,1) = '0' then '' --최신현장번호가 있을 경우 현장전화 제외하고 조회 else SAPHEE.GET_TELE_FORMAT (VALUE(mma01.zsite_tel, '')) end as zsite_tel ,SAPHEE.GET_TELE_FORMAT (VALUE(left(pm07.ztel,13), '')) as zsite_tel_new ,LF1.NAME1 AS TPLSTDT1 ,LF2.NAME1 AS TPLSTDT2 ,LF3.NAME1 AS TPLSTDT3 ,LF4.NAME1 AS TPLSTDT4 ,LF5.NAME1 AS TPLSTDT5 ,T1.TPLSTDTQTY1 ,T1.TPLSTDTQTY2 ,T1.TPLSTDTQTY3 ,T1.TPLSTDTQTY4 ,T1.TPLSTDTQTY5 ,CHAR(T1.TPLSTDTZTON1, 100) AS TPLSTDTZTON1 ,CHAR(T1.TPLSTDTZTON2, 100) AS TPLSTDTZTON2 ,CHAR(T1.TPLSTDTZTON3, 100) AS TPLSTDTZTON3 ,CHAR(T1.TPLSTDTZTON4, 100) AS TPLSTDTZTON4 ,CHAR(T1.TPLSTDTZTON5, 100) AS TPLSTDTZTON5 ,LF6.NAME1 AS TPLSTDT6 ,T1.TPLSTDTQTY6 ,CHAR(T1.TPLSTDTZTON6, 100) AS TPLSTDTZTON6 ,LF7.NAME1 AS TPLSTDT7 ,T1.TPLSTDTQTY7 ,CHAR(T1.TPLSTDTZTON7, 100) AS TPLSTDTZTON7 ,T1.SPEC2 ,VARCHAR(CAR.CARINFO, 900) AS CARINFO
,T1.CHNGCONFIRM AS CHNGCONFIRM
,'' AS CHNGCONFIRM
, T1.ZSTAT , T1.ZTRANS , T1.TABNM FROM TMP T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TMP T2 ON T2.MANDT = T1.MANDT AND T2.ZKNUM = T1.ZKNUM AND T2.ZKNUM2 = '' --left outer join saphee.zlet001_1 as lt001 on T1.mandt = lt001.mandt and T1.ZLZONE = lt001.zone1 left outer join saphee.zmaster01 as mma01 on T1.mandt = mma01.mandt and T1.pspid = mma01.posid left outer join saphee.ZPSTPM07 as pm07 on T1.mandt = pm07.mandt and T1.pspid = pm07.posid left outer join SAPHEE.ZMMT012 as LF1 on t1.TPLSTDT1 = LF1.LIFNR left outer join SAPHEE.ZMMT012 as LF2 on t1.TPLSTDT2 = LF2.LIFNR left outer join SAPHEE.ZMMT012 as LF3 on t1.TPLSTDT3 = LF3.LIFNR left outer join SAPHEE.ZMMT012 as LF4 on t1.TPLSTDT4 = LF4.LIFNR left outer join SAPHEE.ZMMT012 as LF5 on t1.TPLSTDT5 = LF5.LIFNR left outer join SAPHEE.ZMMT012 as LF6 on t1.TPLSTDT6 = LF6.LIFNR left outer join SAPHEE.ZMMT012 as LF7 on t1.TPLSTDT7 = LF7.LIFNR LEFT OUTER JOIN ( -- 톤수, 출발지, 차량번호, 전화번호 SELECT ZKNUM, ZKNUM2, LEFT(LISTAGG('('||ZTON ||'/'|| TPLSTDT || CASE WHEN TRAID = '' THEN '' ELSE '/'|| TRAID END || CASE WHEN MOB_NUMBER = '' THEN '' ELSE '/'|| MOB_NUMBER END ||') / '),length(LISTAGG('('||ZTON ||'/'|| TPLSTDT || CASE WHEN TRAID = '' THEN '' ELSE '/'|| TRAID END || CASE WHEN MOB_NUMBER = '' THEN '' ELSE '/'|| MOB_NUMBER END ||') / ')) - 2 ) AS CARINFO
FROM ( SELECT A.ZKNUM ,A.ZSEQ ,A.TRAID ,A.MOB_NUMBER ,CASE WHEN A.ZTON = 'A' THEN '1 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'B' THEN '2.5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'C' THEN '3.5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'D' THEN '5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'E' THEN '8 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'F' THEN '11 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'G' THEN '18 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'H' THEN '25 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'I' THEN 'Trailer' WHEN A.ZTON = 'J' THEN '택배' WHEN A.ZTON = 'K' THEN 'Trail-20' WHEN A.ZTON = 'L' THEN 'Trail-40' WHEN A.ZTON = 'M' THEN 'Trail-20 왕복' WHEN A.ZTON = 'N' THEN 'Trail-40 왕복' WHEN A.ZTON = 'O' THEN '셔틀' ELSE '' END AS ZTON , A.ZKNUM2 , C.NAME1 AS TPLSTDT FROM SAPHEE.ZLET041 A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET002 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.ZKNUM = B.ZKNUM AND A.ZKNUM2 = B.ZKNUM2 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 C ON A.TPLSTDT = C.LIFNR WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# --AND A.ZKNUM = '20210107-001' --AND A.ZKNUM2 = '' UNION SELECT A.ZKNUM ,A.ZSEQ ,A.TRAID ,A.MOB_NUMBER ,CASE WHEN A.ZTON = 'A' THEN '1 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'B' THEN '2.5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'C' THEN '3.5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'D' THEN '5 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'E' THEN '8 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'F' THEN '11 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'G' THEN '18 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'H' THEN '25 ton' WHEN A.ZTON = 'I' THEN 'Trailer' WHEN A.ZTON = 'J' THEN '택배' WHEN A.ZTON = 'K' THEN 'Trail-20' WHEN A.ZTON = 'L' THEN 'Trail-40' WHEN A.ZTON = 'M' THEN 'Trail-20 왕복' WHEN A.ZTON = 'N' THEN 'Trail-40 왕복' WHEN A.ZTON = 'O' THEN '셔틀' ELSE '' END AS ZTON , A.ZKNUM2 , A.TPLSTDT FROM SAPHEE.ZLET041 A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET006 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.ZKNUM = B.ZKNUM AND A.ZKNUM2 = B.ZKNUM2 WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# -- AND A.ZKNUM = '20210107-001' -- AND A.ZKNUM2 = '' ORDER BY ZSEQ ASC ) GROUP BY ZKNUM, ZKNUM2 ) CAR ON T1.ZKNUM = CAR.ZKNUM AND T1.ZKNUM2 = CAR.ZKNUM2 WHERE 1=1
--and lt001.lifcd = 'A' and T1.LIFNRCO = '3148131696'
--and lt001.lifcd = 'B' and T1.LIFNRCO = '1018194310'
and T1.LIFNRCO = '3038100062'
ORDER BY ERDAT, ERZET, PSPID2, ZKNUM ,ZKNUM2 FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
